GetLoot(HashMap<Integer, Integer>, int, int) - Method in class Explorer.LootController
Will use items + weights to create a map of items + numbers 0.5 slots to 1.5 slots are created and foreach slot, an item is selected from the weighted list.

GetWeighted(HashMap<Integer, Integer>) - Method in class Explorer.LootController
Creates a range by adding all weights, where each item takes up space according to its weight Is used to select an item while respecting the items weight.
